Identity.History: Father of Hannibal and virtual military dictator of Carthage. Hamilcar Barca was a soldier and politician who excelled along his entire career. Lived 275-228 BC. While overshadowed by his sons, Hamilcar was a great general in his own right, earning the nickname Baraq or Barca for the "lightning" speed of his advance.

HamilcarMount.Tooltip: This gives Hamilcar his War Horse, with trample effects and greater health.
